EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_TorontoOfficeOpening_Q314.Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed to attend Pivotal Toronto: Grand Office Opening (September 25)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
REGISTRATION CONFIRMATION Hello {{lead.First Name:default=}},
Thank you for registering for Pivotal Toronto: Grand Office Opening Please see event details below.
Date: Thursday, September 25th, 2014 Time: 6 p.m. - 9 p.m Location: Pivotal Office, 1 Toronto St, 11th Floor, Toronto, ON. M5C 2V6
Should you have any questions or would like more information, please email elogue@gopivotal.com <mailto:elogue@gopivotal.com> See you on Thursday, September 25th!
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
